properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Follow follow I would follow Jesus Anywhere everywhere I will follow on Follow follow I would follow Jesus Everywhere He leads me I would follow on{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Down in the valley With my Saviour I would go Where the flowers are blooming And the sweet waters flow Everywhere He leads me I would follow follow on Walking in His footsteps Till the crown be won{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Down in the valley With my Saviour I would go Where the storms are sweeping And the dark waters flow With His hand to lead me I will never never fear Danger cannot fright me If my Lord is near{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Down in the valley Or upon the mountain steep Close beside my Savior Would my heart ever keep He will lead me safely In the path that He has trod Up to where they gather On the hills of God{/lang-eng}
